getDataModel

getWorker

OptimizerWorker getWorker()
Returns:
Returns the current worker to be used for optimizing the views in this VennPanel

getView

IVennDiagramView getView()
Returns:
Returns the set of Venn diagram views (every disjunct set may get an extra Venn diagram)

selectGroups

void selectGroups(java.util.BitSet groups)
Selects the given set of group id's (e.g. paint selected groups in another color)

Parameters:
groups - If groups is null the selection is removed

getSelectedGroups

java.util.BitSet getSelectedGroups()
Returns:
Returns a BitSet corresponding to the selected groups in the panel.

highlightGroups

void highlightGroups(java.util.BitSet groups)
Highlights the given set of group id's (e.g. paint highlighted groups in another color)

Parameters:
groups - If groups is null the highlighting is removed

getHighlightedGroups

java.util.BitSet getHighlightedGroups()
Returns:
The currently highlighted groups.
